original_text: The priest shall offer the sin offering, to make atonement for him who is to be cleansed from his uncleanness. And afterward he shall kill the burnt offering.
korean_text: 또 제사장은 속죄제를 드려 그 부정함으로 말미암아 정결함을 받을 자를 위하여 속죄하고 그 후에 번제물을 잡을 것이요

sentences.original_text: The priest shall offer the sin offering
who is to be cleansed from his uncleanness.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기의 부정함에서 정결하게 될 자니라

sentences.original_text: And afterward he shall kill the burnt offering.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그는 번제물을 잡을 것이니라
